projects.title: CV
projects.description: This was my first portfolio created using frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. At that time, my knowledge was very basic as I had just completed a full-stack course. During the course, which was conducted by the T.tec program at Egg, I learned the fundamentals of frontend technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Additionally, I also learned how to work with the backend using Java and Spring Boot. One notable aspect of the course was that it allowed us to work in teams in different groups, which changed in every class.

projects.title: See Image
projects.description: I created this project for a basic Python programming course that I taught for the Topiarte civil association. The course covered the fundamentals of Python and an introduction to graphical user interfaces (GUIs). As the final project, I proposed creating a program that could display images and allow for modifications. It was a new experience for me, and I learned a lot from the challenges that arose during the course, which helped me grow and overcome obstacles.

projects.title: Portafolio Django
projects.description: I decided to create this portfolio after learning Django in a Udemy course, which covered the basics of Python, HTML, CSS, Tkinter, and Django. The course was interesting, but the most exciting part was learning about the Django framework, which was my first experience with it.

projects.title: I Sales
projects.description: I created this program for a local store called Zona Urbana, which sells clothing. They needed a simple program to manage their stock and calculate the change for cash transactions. To develop it, I used my knowledge of Python, the customTkinter library for the interface, and Peewee for managing and creating the database. I decided to use SQLite for the database since the program will only be used in one store and on a single computer.

projects.title: Amazing Events
projects.description: For my final project in the Mind Hub course, I created a website using all the skills we learned in the course, including HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This project was particularly enjoyable for me because I faced some challenges that required me to do some research and learn new things I wasn't familiar with before. Overall, I am proud of the final result and it has helped me grow as a developer.

projects.title: MDHL
projects.description: This is the first project proposed in Mind Hub where the challenge was to create a website for a fictional client who wanted a page for parents to inform and enroll their children. We were given a design as a basis, but the colors and layout were up to us. The only allowed technologies were HTML and CSS.

projects.title: CV Rest Api
projects.description: I created this project for a TICMAS course, where I learned the basic concepts of frontend development. During the course, I was taught the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript, as well as how to consume and use APIs on our webpages.

projects.title: Portafolio React
projects.description: This is a personal project that I created to strengthen my knowledge in React and Tailwind, which I learned on my own by searching for information and clarifying my doubts with ChatGPT. It was a great challenge for me since I had no prior knowledge of these two technologies, but I enjoyed it as a personal challenge.

projects.title: ADN Solution
projects.description: This was my first project whit ADN Soulition created using frontend technologies like HTML, CSS, JS, ReactJS, Tallwindcss. in my team we passed the project writed on HTML CSS and JS to Reactjs and TalwindCSS
